resources.string: This application is the Final Work of the Master of Telecommunication Engineer, Juniors Antonio Medina Lande√≥n and student of CICE, and it is a P2P chat application, using the UDP communication protocol, in that application the user must enter his name, his Pin, ie a random number between 1024 and 65535 (free ports), the pin of the other user (destination) must also be a random number, it should be noted that the two users of the application must inform each other about which pins , And finally enter the IP address of the mobile device of the destination, I personally think that in this work I apply very important concepts such as Intents, permissions, Threads, Handlers, Adapters, Listview among others ...
